scripts.init-vscode: code --force --install-extension dbaeumer.vscode-eslint && code --force --install-extension esbenp.prettier-vscode && code --force --install-extension stylelint.vscode-stylelint && code --force --install-extension johnsoncodehk.volar && code --force --install-extension voorjaar.windicss-intellisense && code --force --install-extension hbenl.vscode-test-explorer && code --force --install-extension kavod-io.vscode-jest-test-adapter
scripts.clean-slate: pnpm add -DW rimraf && pnpm -r clean && pnpm -r --filter {"packages"} exec rimraf "node_modules" && rimraf "node_modules"
